mapper.select: SELECT a.nickName,b.*,ci.FEEDBACK,ci.INTERVIEW_ID,ci.INTERVIEW_DATE,dept.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME FROM t_user a JOIN t_candidate_interview ci ON ci.INTERVIEWER_ID = a.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_candidate b on ci.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept dept on dept.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = ci.CSSUBDEPT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} and (ci.FEEDBACK='' or ci.FEEDBACK is null) ORDER BY ci.INTERVIEW_DATE LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};
mapper.update: update t_candidate_interview set FEEDBACK = #{interviewFeedBack}, INTERVIEW_STATUS = #{interviewStatus} WHERE INTERVIEW_ID = #{interviewId};

ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,EXPERIENCE_YEARS desc,EDUCATION,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT ${exportDataColumn} FROM t_candidate a left join t_user b on a.LOCK_PERSION = b.USER_ID left join t_user c on a.CREATE_USER = c.USER_ID WHERE CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (4,5,6)
ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,EXPERIENCE_YEARS desc,EDUCATION,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID;

SELECT a.*,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME FROM t_candidate a LEFT JOIN (select * from (select CANDIDATE_ID,CS_SUBDEPT_ID from t_candidate_push a where PUSH_DATE = (select max(PUSH_DATE) from t_candidate_push b where a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID ) )a group by CANDIDATE_ID )b ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept c ON b.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = c.CS_SUBDEPT_ID WHERE a.LOCK_PERSION=#{lockPerson} and CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (3,4,5,6)
ORDER BY CANDIDATE_STATUS,INTERVIEW_STATUS,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT count(0) FROM t_candidate a WHERE a.LOCK_PERSION=#{lockPerson} and CANDIDATE_STATUS not in (3,4,5,6)
;
SELECT CS_SUBDEPT_ID as csSubDeptId, CS_SUBDEPT_NAME as csSubDeptName FROM t_cs_dept a group by CS_SUBDEPT_ID,CS_SUBDEPT_NAME ORDER BY CS_SUBDEPT_NAME;

update t_candidate set CANDIDATE_STATUS = #{candidateStatus} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};

SELECT a.*,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,d.STATUS as demandStatus FROM t_candidate a LEFT JOIN (select * from (select CANDIDATE_ID,CS_SUBDEPT_ID from t_candidate_push a where PUSH_DATE = (select max(PUSH_DATE) from t_candidate_push b where a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID ) )a group by CANDIDATE_ID )b ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = b.CANDIDATE_ID LEFT JOIN t_cs_dept c ON b.CS_SUBDEPT_ID = c.CS_SUBDEPT_ID INNER JOIN t_demand d ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = d.CANDIDATE_ID WHERE a.LOCK_PERSION=#{lockPerson} and CANDIDATE_STATUS in (1,2) and d.STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade','delay','Onboard')
ORDER BY d.STATUS,CANDIDATE_STATUS,INTERVIEW_STATUS,c.CS_SUBDEPT_NAME,MAJOR_STATUS,CANDIDATE_ID LIMIT #{currentPage},#{pageDataCount};

SELECT count(0) FROM t_candidate a INNER JOIN t_demand d ON a.CANDIDATE_ID = d.CANDIDATE_ID WHERE a.LOCK_PERSION=#{lockPerson} and CANDIDATE_STATUS in (1,2) and d.STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade','delay','Onboard')
;

update t_candidate set ARRIVAL_DATE = #{arrivalDate} WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId};
update t_demand set STATUS = 'delay' WHERE CANDIDATE_ID = #{candidateId} and STATUS in ('OfferMade','Offermade');
